description: A bovine figure is visible through the window of a building identified as a barber shop. A sign in the window indicates this unusual barber performs hair styling. The presence of a cow in this human profession is a distinctly absurd situation. The sign's phrasing suggests this cow barber also offers standard haircuts, amplifying the surrealism. This presents a humorous scenario through the unexpected and illogical vocational placement of a farm animal.
caption: null
